teaser: Online payment company PayPal has released a new version of its app for Android and Apple's iOS operating systems. The company is hoping it will make a big difference in a tricky area: Mobile e-commerce. And Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim joins us to play Silicon Tally.
description: Online payment company PayPal has released a new version of its app for Android and Apple's iOS operating systems. The company is hoping it will make a big difference in a tricky area: Mobile e-commerce. And Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim joins us to play Silicon Tally.
byline: Nishat Kurwa, Bruce Johnson and Queena Kim
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, September 6, 2013
